boardgame.name: The Descendant Episode 2: Into the Storm
boardgame.description:
Mia and Silas clash over the fallout of another crisis that threatens the lives of the descendants, and Donnie works with Randolph to make Ark01 operational again, uncovering a shocking revelation about their mission. Who lives, who dies, and the fate of the new world rest solely in your hands. Will you save humanity or will you doom us all?

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: The Descendant Episode 3: What Lies Beneath
boardgame.description:
Silas is forced to face the consequences of his actions, Randolph reveals his reasons for being in Ark-01, while Donnie ventures deeper into the Ark and makes a deadly discovery.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Pro Cycling The Board Game
boardgame.description:
Pro Cycling The Board Game is 2020’s latest cycling board game, a fun and tactical game from the world of pro series. In the game you have to control a professional cycling team and get the most points by the end of the game. The following game items are available for this.

1. Team organization: From the five-person frame, assemble a four-person team according to the conditions of the race track – for the flat sections SPRINTER, for the mountain sections CLIMBER, and a LEADER who leads the team.
2. PELOTON: The field that is uniquely part of the competition.
3. Track knowledge: Mapping the race track and getting to know the most important action points.
- The colorful lines on both sides of the racing track indicate the difficulty level of the
road and the level of steepness.
- PART SPRINT: You can also earn valuable points during the race.
- REFRESHING POINT: Additional action cards can be drawn.
- BIG FALL, TECHNICAL ERROR: Various disadvantages can be obtained.
4. Game dice and action die: The player makes the moves using the two dice.
5. Action Cards: Action cards can be used to launch actions.
- BREAKAWAY CARD: This card can be used to break away from the peloton.
- ATTACK CARD: It gives the player an opportunity for a quick attack.
- PELOTON CARD: Used to increase the pace of the field.
6. In addition to action cards, other special actions can be used, such as a sprint, helping each other, helping the leader.

The board game is not only for bike fans, but also offers fun for the whole family. The number of players: 2-4 people. The duration of a game is 40-60 minutes depending on the number of players. The rulebook is available in the following languages: Hungarian, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish.

boardgame.name: The Descendant Episode 4: Cerberus
boardgame.description:
Donnie and Randolph are forced to put their differences aside and work together to achieve their mission, while Mia awakens to find the Ark and everything within it changed forever, and faces off against the last danger she could have ever expected. Who lives, who dies, and the fate of the new world rests solely in your hands. Will you save humanity or will you doom us all?

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: The Descendant Episode 5: Ultimatum
boardgame.description:
In THE DESCENDANT - Episode 5: Ultimatum, the past and present collide, and nothing will ever be the same. As Donnie reaches the end of his mission and comes face-to-face with the last janitor of Ark-01, a final confrontation will determine what happens to Mia, the descendants, and everyone above ground.

Who lives, who dies, and the fate of the new world rests solely in your hands. Will you save humanity or will you doom us all?

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Ziu Zizzu
boardgame.description:
Ziu Zizzu is a video game made in Sardinia, released in 1997. Despite being buggy and frustrating in different parts, it achieved some success at the time, probably also due to the folkloristic settings and a successful marketing campaign.

Ziu Zizzu must grab everything he finds in the various levels, paying attention to various traps. Sardinian traditional sweets and delicacies, such as pabassinos, casizolu cheese, wine, casu martzu cheese, etc., allow Ziu Zizzu to make points.

boardgame.name: DreamCraft
Lucidity
boardgame.description: DreamCraft is an RPG game wherein you play a person in R.E.M. sleep and try to keep the dream alive! The setting of the game is a world where people have learned to manipulate their dreams in order to alter their waking life! The more successful you are in your dreams, the better your “real life” will be!

boardgame.name: Scoundrel Options
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this File, scoundrel options! Brand-new archetypes for characters with Assassination Dedication, Loremaster Dedication, Poisoner Dedication, and Scout Dedication! Bully foes you’ve Marked for Death, throw bombs of deadly blight at your enemies, harry them to discover their weaknesses, and more!

boardgame.name: Parallel Worlds (Issue 15 - Nov 2020)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this issue, we interview Bob Salley, the creator of graphic novel Broken Gargoyles, and sci-fi new wave veteran Michael Butterworth. We find out why DropZone Commander is such a great miniatures game, whether Cowboy Bebop Space Serenade is worth your time, and what's been going on in Destiny this year. We review strange new roleplaying game PARIAH, horror anime The Promised Neverland, and Aliya Whiteley's kaleidoscopic sci-fi novel Greensmith. And we carry on our Gamesmasterclass series, as well as our usual original fiction.

boardgame.name: Megawatt: Discover Energy (Second Edition)
boardgame.description:
Megawatt is a card game that challenges you to build an electricity grid. Use Tech cards to supply power and Upgrade cards to improve your grid. Boost your hand or mess with other players using Action cards.

Adapt as the world changes around you when new Event cards appear. Events cover a variety of real-world scenarios which put your grid to the test. Can you power the future?

Find out more at www.megawatt.game

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: North Dakota-opoly
boardgame.description:
Buy your favorite North Dakota properties, increase your rent by collecting Cabins and trading them for Lodges. Sound easy? Well, add in some lawnmower racing, the IRS and a drought and it gets a little more difficult and a lot more fun!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: Late for the Sky Production Company

boardgame.name: Kings of War: Vanguard – Ice and Iron
boardgame.description:
This is a campaign and warband supplement for Kings of War.

It includes a campaign for 2 to 4 players set in the frozen north. It has new rules for severe weather, rationing supplies, and exploration.

It also has seven new scenarios for your Vanguard games.

It has updated warband lists with errata and eight new factions.

Finally it has rules for multiplayer games.

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: The Mediceo
boardgame.description:
In the game, the Mediceo will be a new playable hero and will be part of your Company.

His starting class will be the Hunter and he can evolve into a Bounty Hunter or Monster Hunter.

Like every Hero, he will have his own set of 3 basic equipment (his armor and weapons), 2 Hero sheets, and 1 Skill sheet, plus he will have a set of 9 new craftable Special Equipment. Most of his equipment (which can also be used by others Heroes) are fantastic inventions that Leonardo Da Vinci created for the Medici of Florence. Items with spectacular qualities, such as the Automatic Grapple or the Flame-Breath Wrist, will be a great addition to your company arsenal.

The Mediceo skills will represent in-game his abilities as a rifleman and gunslinger, and his cunning and reflexes, which on more than once have saved his life.

As a Bounty Hunter, he will become even more lethal, competing with Sofia as the damage dealer of the group; as a Monster Hunter, the use of traps and high mobility will give him great control of the field, trapping Enemies, blocking Reinforcements Points, and dealing massive damage to larger targets.

With his 6 Destiny cards, you will discover new details about his history!

Available from the beginning and is being sent free to backers that backed within the first 48 hours. Otherwise, it is an add-on.

-description from kickstarter

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Hyperion
boardgame.description:
Hyperion is the first Hunt Mission and will see our heroes pursuing the fiery Titan in a mini-side-campaign that culminates in the death fight against Hyperion itself!

The Hunt Missions are special Boss fights where the heroes will have to contend with a lethal opponent managed by special Action Cards. Each card describes the Enemy's action and its Action Point (AP) cost. Actions can be attacks, movements, or special abilities and the Heroes will have to learn to know the moves of their prey if they want to have a hope of victory. The Hunt Missions can be faced several times so that every time you will have the possibility to obtain new reagents for crafting.

Hyperion can also be used in Black Rose Wars as a new and powerful Asymmetrical Mage! A Player will be able to control Hyperion, using a basic deck consisting of 6 Unique Spells and composing their deck during the game as usual.

Hyperion will also be equipped with 3 copies of his Personal Spell and will be able to change form, transforming through one of his spells into his Burning Legion composed of 3 Myrmidons. Depending on his form, he will have different advantages and disadvantages and will use his 3 new Lodge Rooms to teleport or as a Cell for when he re-enters the game after being defeated.

Also in this set, you will find 2 new Forgotten Spells that will allow you to summon Hyperion or the 3 Myrmidons during your standard BRW games.

-description from Kickstarter

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Upgrade Kit
boardgame.description:
With the 30 enemy cards contained in Nova Aetas Renaissance: Upgrade Kit, you can insert the many enemies of the core Nova Aetas game, the expansions, and the stretch goals into Nova Aetas Renaissance.

Many missions involve the use of random enemies and scenery. Enemies can be spawned thanks to the draft cards and reinforcement points. These are particular scenic elements that modify the map, or from which one or more enemies can be deployed on the battlefield, at particular times within the missions.

When this happens, you will have to form an enemy deck with all the draft cards of a faction and randomly draw the enemy to deploy. For this phase, you can insert the draft cards from the conversion kit to add variability to your games and confront a wider variety of enemies!

Here is a list of the cards that you will find in the Kit divided by faction:

Rome

-Battle Sister
-Papal Guard
-Swiss Guard
-Caterina Sforza
-Lothar Basler
-Templar
-Cardinal
-Blacksmith

Venice

-Assassin
-Stratiota
-Witch
-Crossbowman
-Giovanni del Nord
-Cabalist
-Traveler
-Hunter

Fauns

-Centaur
-Faun Warrior
-Faun Musician

Mercenary

-Pigman
-Circe
-Head Cultist
-Scarface
-Obsidian Beast
-Cyclop
-King Vesuvio
-Lady of Fire
-Condottiere
-Mater Ignis
-Salamanders

You will be able to include these enemies in all missions that feature random enemies depending on their faction. Mercenaries are a particular category of enemies that can join multiple factions.

In addition to the enemies, this kit gives you access to some of the old scenic elements contained in the original game, with the following 6 cards:

-Well x1
-Inn x1
-Pine x1
-House x1
-Goods crates x1
-Chart x1

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: PARIAH Issue One
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:



PSYCHEDELIC NEOLITHIC ANIMIST OLD SCHOOL ROLE PLAY

PARIAH is a zine that will enable you to set up and run a tabletop RPG pitching a band of outcast humans against a dangerous, primeval world of malevolent magic and capricious spirits... all in an A5 zine format originally produced for Zine Quest 2020.

A complete game in and of itself, PARIAH is nonetheless easily adapted to your preferred old-school system. Indeed, many of the tools provided would be useful in any RPG you think suitable for the weird world of proto-neolithic roleplay!


OUTCASTS

The zine contains instructions for generating a band of pariahs - outcasts from mainstream human culture forced into the dangerous wilderness:

Classless and level-less: develop characters through interaction with the environment, building alliances, developing skills and forging pacts with spirits.
Lateral development: special curse templates that can lead your characters down unexpected paths including ghoul, jackalwere and blood-drinker...
Troupe play: control multiple characters, share them until they have grown into themselves, guide them as though you were their ancestral spirits.
Build a community: foster young charges, care for the old, build the skill base of your pariah band, the better to face the challenges ahead.
Die: lay down your lie for the good of your allies and roll up another pariah.




ANIMISTS

Everything is alive: navigate a world where mountains, rivers, trees and even insects possess their own desires and ambitions!

Rules for generating spirits and determining their attitude to the PCs.
An original magic system based on conjuring, binding and bargaining with spirits.




PSYCHEDELIC

This is a time of chaos: rationality has yet to force reality into a fixed form, and the boundaries between the corporeal and ethereal fluctuate...

Six psychedelic entheogens with unique properties!
Travel to the spirit world and find the true name of your enemies.
Create your own rituals, customs and traditions from afresh: this is a young world, and your characters are defining a new culture!




OLD SCHOOL

Emphasis on player skill over character skill: play as the characters' guardian spirits, not as the characters themselves.

Highly lethal: get them out of danger quickly or be prepared to roll up another one.
Sandbox style play: GMs are encouraged to create situations and challenges, not linear plots. Let the world come alive and happen around the PCs, with or without their participation!
Rulings not rule: Take your pick of the guidelines within the zine, and fashion them to the tastes of your table. Use the tools for generating a world and populating it with danger and intrigue without being bound by mechanics.
Familiar: Uses the traditional six ability scores and five saves so easy to pick up and easy to adapt to other old school systems.

boardgame.name: PARIAH: Mutations
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

When you were born was there something different about you?

Were your parents forced to abandon you to the wilds due to the extreme prejudice of their band mates?

Or did you experience something weird and eldritch and now you've... changed...

TIME TO ROLL 1d100 AND CONSULT THIS TABLE!

100 Mutations for use with the PARIAH game

boardgame.name: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon – Companions
boardgame.description: This Add-on includes 4 animal companion collectors' models: a crow, a badger, a piglet, and a feral cat. They have no additional gameplay function, as they are represented in-game by Item cards found in each Core Box of Tainted Grail. They will, however, make a great addition to your collection

boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Detailed hex descriptions for 24 terrain types.
Wandering monster/encounter tables.
Weather.
Rest and recovery.
Training and crafting.
Tracking, hunting, fishing and foraging.

boardgame.description:

This addon is purely cosmetic and does not include any additional gameplay elements but will make a great addition to your collection ;)

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Minotaur
boardgame.description:
A mini-campaign hunt mission where you must chase after the powerful Minotaur. This expansion includes:

- 75mm Minotaur model
- Prey Card
- Mission Card
- 16 Prey Action Cards
- 3 Equipment Cards
- 3 Reagent Cards

boardgame.description: This 68x68 cm neoprene playmat includes spaces for your revealed Location cards, as well as Encounter and Event decks.

boardgame.name: PARIAH: Tactical Supplement
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Additional combat rules for PARIAH, free to download. Can be adapted to most OSR/ retroclone games.

Fully bookmarked, layered pdf available to download for free including:

Active defence rules
Random combat events
Damage reducing armour
Aerial combat
Advanced death & dismemberment

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Under Siege
boardgame.description:
May 5, 1527, a day that will be remembered forever, for one of the bloodiest and most famous sieges in history, the Sack of Rome.

The Imperial army led by General Frundsberg and composed of the Landsknecht, ruthless mercenaries from Germany and Spain, are about to enter Rome to sack it and capture the Pope... Only you can prevent it!

Set years after the main campaign of Nova Aetas: Renaissance, in Under Siege you will find your favorite heroes to be more mature and engaged in an impossible mission! This new Campaign made up of 10 new frenetic Missions will see you engaged in the desperate task of resisting the Imperial assault and saving the Pope, before it's too late ... but you will have to be shrewd and brave, the enemy army is not composed only of humans!

Each Mission will be a race against time, always with different mechanics to manage the massive clashes between the defenders of Rome (including the miniatures of the core box faction of Rome) and the ruthless assailants!

In Under Siege, you will find 4 new Tiles and new scenic elements to represent Renaissance Rome, such as the spectacular Aqueduct/the door to the City/Passetto (an elevated secret passage)!

In Under Siege, you'll also find a new Hero, Brynhildr the Lancer, a warrior of German origin who came to Rome to help the Pope against his former compatriots.

Finally, Under Siege introduces the Allies to NAR! Allies can be added to your company and will help you with Missions. Giovanni dalle Bande Nere, the brave captain in defense of the Eternal City, will be able to join your group as a model in its own right and you can control him as if he were an additional hero, but with more limited rules.

Plus, you'll have fantastic new miniatures, new special items, and new rules to represent the German tide sweeping through the city's neighborhoods!

Get ready, the siege is about to begin!

-description from kickstarter

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Vesuvio
boardgame.description:
Our Heroes will have to investigate the surroundings of the Volcano to find traces of the mysterious Cult of the Forge, a band of possessed who is making ferocious attacks in the area!
Members of this cult inflict terrible tribal mutilation on themselves to resemble the gigantic creatures they worship.

The Cyclops are the true protagonists of this new adventure. Master smiths, but also mighty warriors, led by their King Vesuvio are looking for ancient artifacts scattered around the slopes of their volcano, and to find them they won't hesitate to attack villages and cities!

It will be up to our Heroes to investigate and put an end to this threat, in an adventurous journey that will take them through the buried streets of ancient Pompeii, to the heart of the Volcano, where the Forge of Vesuvio is about to be rekindled!

This rich expansion will add a new campaign that can be played between the end of the main campaign and Under Siege and adds a new Faction, The Forge, made up of the Scarfaces, the Head Cultist, Obsidian Beasts (bigger!), Cyclops, and of course King Vesuvio himself!

The campaign consisting of 10 new missions (completely revised from the original), can be finished with 4 different endings and will take you to explore new fantastic locations represented by new 3D scenic elements (such as the semi-destroyed houses of Pompeii or the Obelisk of the Forge), and by two new Map Tiles!

-description from kickstarter page

boardgame.name: Nova Aetas Renaissance: Catacombs
boardgame.description:
Catacombs take Nova Aetas: Renaissance's gameplay experience to a new level by transforming it into a true Dungeon Crawler.

As you know Nova Aetas: Renaissance is a tactical RPG, where the Missions are real cooperative clashes with precisely written objectives to be met in order to achieve victory.

With Catacombs the game system will be adapted to live adventures in pure dungeon crawler style, with our Heroes busy exploring sites buried for centuries and now inhabited by creepy creatures.

Catacomb will offer players a new mini secondary campaign (3 Missions), which can be undertaken when, at any point in the main campaign, the Heroes are in Rome.

You will have the opportunity to explore the Domus Aurea, the ancient home of Emperor Nero, now buried for centuries. Entering its corridors in search of riches, you will have to face Nero himself (well at least what remains of him) and his horde of undead constructs, awakened by a dark primordial force, and ready to invade the city sowing terror and destruction!

But the potential of Catacomb does not end there! Since the vestiges of the Roman Empire are found everywhere in Italy, you can throw yourself into the exploration of other catacombs in any city that has the keyword "Catacomb", and face always different dungeons created with a simple procedural system.

The really super thing about this mode will be that you will also be able to meet other factions of Enemies within the Catacomb, representing other groups of tomb raiders, who descended into the dungeon with the same intentions as you!

Whenever you want, you can take a break from the normal Nova Aetas: Renaissance Missions and spend an evening in dungeon crawler style, throwing yourself into the Catacombs in search of loot!

Plus, Catacomb is perfect if you want to play Nova Aetas: Renaissance one-shot games without worrying too much about having to keep track of the Mission for the future!

Descending into the catacombs will give you a completely different gaming experience from the base game and will reward you with special loot cards and new recipes for creating powerful special items.

But you will not be alone in facing the hordes of undead legionaries, a new Hero: Luca "Skavino" will join your group and guide you through the maze of dungeons with his skills and taking advantage of the many relics of the past that he found in his underground forays!

A survival expert, and ever resourceful, Luca will be a very different Hero from the others and will use a special Relic Deck to help his companions or easily eliminate Enemies! Obviously, it can be used in any Mission and not just inside the Catacomb.

What are you waiting for then? Prepare ropes and torches ... the Catacombs await you!

-description from the Kickstarter

boardgame.name: The Venusian Job
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Nobody’s ever robbed The Aphrodite — but then, you’ve never tried before. Stealing credits is more trouble than it’s worth, so your target is the vault, with millions in wealthy guests’ souvenirs and collateral. It won’t be easy to break into a casino that rises above the Venusian cloud cover, but make it out of this alive, and you’ll be set for life — provided you don’t leave a trace.

The Venusian job is a super-slim, self-contained, lo-fi sci-fi RPG about pulling off a casino heist on another planet. It's inspired by Ocean's Eleven and Leverage, and built with the same rules as the free 24XX SRD. It's 3 pages and a cover, fitting on two sides of a letter-sized page.

boardgame.name: Tempus Diducit
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

They call it the Unraveling. Or they will, anyway. Hard to say with time travel. Too many trips, and timelines begin to fray at the edges. Most folks just struggle to adapt to this broken world. Some exploit it for their own gain. But for others — the warriors, investigators, and agents of change — there are wrongs to right, paradoxers to catch, and a glimmer of hope of fixing this mess.

Tempus Diducit is a super-slim, self-contained, lo-fi sci-fi RPG about a world where every era is happening right now. It's inspired by every bonkers, kitchen-sink roleplaying game you've ever shaken your head at. It's built with the same rules as the free 24XX SRD, and encourages you to bring in characters made from any other 24XX game. It's 3 pages and a cover, fitting on two sides of a letter-sized page.

boardgame.name: Kaijupunk 202X
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The future is not what it used to be. Humanity has transcended its limitations through technology, science, and the dark power of the Oni. Cyborgs walk the streets. Kaiju DNA grants inhuman power. And millions around the world find themselves transformed into monstrous Ogres.

But there is defiance in this new generation. With the constant threat of death by giant monster, they live every day like it was their last. Traditional society mocks them, but they revel in the title of Kaijupunks.

Kaijupunk 202X takes the world of Mecha vs Kaiju into a dark future where transhumans clash with hominids in a battle for survival. This sourcebook features rules for:

Transcending human limitations through cybernetics or kaiju mutations;
Transforming into Ogres, warped by the power of the Oni;
Technology, Gadget, and Vehicle creation;
Mecha Frames, power armor for the workers.


Kaijupunk also details a future metropolis, an African Boomtown complete with multiple neighborhoods, rival factions, rich mines, jungles filled with mutant animals, and a wealth of oppportunities for Kaijupunks to make their fortune.

Gear up, and fight for a future worth living in!

boardgame.name: Monster Marathon
boardgame.description:
Imagine a raceway that begins in the woodlands. Typhon, Angrboda, Arachne, Tiamat, Grendel, and Qilin are lined up and ready to compete in a marathon to the volcano. The breeze seems to rot and die from the festering tension, sensing the oncoming rampage that will shake the world. Typhon bursts from the forest with his hundred dragon heads scrambling over each other, creating havoc to disrupt his competitors. Angrboda wields her frost giantess magic to freeze the others with Fimbulwinter cold. Arachne, ever patient, takes her time to weave and scatter web traps far in the distance, beyond the sight of those without eight eyes. Tiamat, unwilling to risk another defeat, unleashes her ten monstrous children throughout the battlefield to ambush her foes and help her when she needs them most. Grendel, the living dreadnought, bashes his way past the others, refusing to be slowed. And the Qilin, well…this dragon deer doesn’t care about the violence, opting to prance ahead, helping whoever they feel like, swaying the tide of the race with benevolent magic. Who wins? What do they do at the end? That’s up to you to decide.

Now imagine that with any combination of 100 monsters from all across the globe.

Monster Marathon is the wild 3-6 player race to set back your friends. Each character has 6 abilities that match your dice roll, so you’ll have to use what you get to survive the 40 spaces to the end.

Here’s a glance at the basic rules:

All players can select the monster they want. Then, choose a lane to start in.

Pick a monster figure and the matching color of tokens. Some abilities will give you tokens for wards, curses, or traps. When you use an ability that gives you a token, select one with a number that matches the ability.

During each turn, you will have two separate rolls of a six-sided die. You roll a die for an ability at the beginning of each turn. The number you roll determines the ability you get to use. After you’ve used your ability, you roll a die to move on the board.

First to the finish wins!

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Robot Overload: Expansion 1
boardgame.description:
This is a stand-alone expansion to the original game, with purple and green robot teams and updated rules for more than 2 players. 2 players can play this version by itself, but combined with additional copies of the expansion or the original version of the game, more players can play together.

Play
Players strategically select from their hand of robot cards as they attack and defend. Each time a player defeats their opponent's robot, they become the attacker on the next round. The defender has the advantage of choosing how to respond to the attacker's card, and may choose to sacrifice both robots to attempt to capture the robots in their opponent's hand. When one player runs out of cards, they are defeated and their opponent is the Robot Master of the World!

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Sumo Salaryman Solo
boardgame.description:
Hello sumo! You are a salaryman (or woman). You loyally go to work for your company every day. You stay overtime when it is required. Even when it isn’t. You appear to others as the model lackey. But in your heart, you are a noble Sumo! You have been training, well...mentally training, to see danger and respond with the heart of a sumo. Others may not see the danger that is everywhere but you do. You know that everything is not always as it seems and that danger lurks in the heart of even the commonplace. Especially there. But, still, you sometimes get distracted by the beauty of things. Such is the complicated heart of a sumo.

This is a quixotic game of pursuiing honor and how you perceive the world. Think Walter Mitty and Don Quioxte. It arose out of my love for Japan and my experiences during my visits. In it, you will become a(much maligned) salaryman with a rich, if possibly misguided, inner life. We are all the salaryman in our own way.

boardgame.name: Oceans: Legends of the Deep
boardgame.description:
Legends of the Deep brings cultural legends from around the globe - and a dash of high fantasy - into the Oceans ecosystem. It is expected to hit Kickstarter in October 2022.

Oceans is a journey from the known world into the unknown, where you discover powerful traits that hardly seem possible in the realm of biology. With Legends of the Deep, you will discover things beyond the realm of science!

Game Play
At the beginning of the game, deal 4 Empire cards to each player. Choose 1 of them, and pass the rest to the player on your left. Continue drafting until everyone has 4 Empire cards.

Once per turn during your Play Cards phase, you may play one of your Empire cards by paying the cost on the card (just like a Deep card). Empire cards have game-changing abilities that affect every one of your species.

To replace an Empire card with a new one, subtract the cost of the old Empire card from the cost of the a new Empire card.

Oceans Discord
Join the Oceans Discord community if you'd like to get involved in playtesting.

https://discord.gg/eeFygGp

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: KAPOW! Volume 2
boardgame.description:
Superhero — or supervillain? You decide in this buildable dice game. Your customizable dice pool is used to execute a variety of superpowers. Gain special abilities and new play experiences by taking on the role of six different heroes or villains.

In KAPOW!, players go head-to-head in a classic explosive clash of good vs. evil. You choose to be a villain or hero, which determines your starting trait dice and unique abilities. You can gain additional blank "action dice" that have removable faces that that you customize to your liking to best enhance your character. Behind a player screen, you roll dice, then allocate them to attack, defense, and power-up abilities. The combination of choosing how to grow your dice pool, how to customize your action die faces, and how to use each roll leads to a satisfying, strategic showdown.

KAPOW! Volume 2 contains six supers: Mindset, Spore, and Crescendo are the heroes, while Fuse, 235, and Reverb are the villains. This set can be combined with KAPOW! Volume 1 to mix and match the characters or have up to four players in one game.

boardgame.name: Jockey & Grand Prix
boardgame.description: Compilation of Jockey and Grand Prix.

boardgame.name: 麻雀拡張カード (Mahjong Expansion Cards)
boardgame.description:
麻雀拡張カード (Mahjong Expansion Cards) is an expansion for the classic game of Mahjong.

This game does not affect the normal rules of Mahjong except that before each game, you should draw a single card from the deck and follow the directions written on the card.

If the drawn card instructs Individual Special Power cards should be distributed to all players, then give each player one Individual Special Power card. That card may only be used by that player alone. Every player should keep their card hidden until they chose to use it.

boardgame.name: PucelOca: el juego de Valladolid
boardgame.description:
PucelOca: el juego de Valladolid is an entertaining board game to investigate the history and the most hidden corners of the capital
The 63-square board combines the dynamics of the game of goose and Trivial Pursuit with 1,200 questions.
Discover what makes Valladolid, may it be artistic, geographical, cultural, religious, political, historical, architectural or environment of the capital.

The game offers 2 game modes:

the players establish a time to play or
advance through the track until reaching the last space 63.


Content:

rules,
cards with 1,200 questions / answers,
4 pawns,
1 dice

boardgame.name: BelLiguria! (Fan expansion for RisiKo!)
LiguRisiKo! (Fan expansion for RisiKo!)
boardgame.description:
Print and Play fan expansion for RisiKo!

Includes a map of Liguria, 54 territory cards (with 3 wild cards) and 14 secret objective cards. You will need a RisiKo! box to play.

The map is divided according to suggestions from the Independence Movement of Liguria.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Detective: City of Angels – Chisel Screen
boardgame.description: A Chisel Screen so the Chisel player can hide all their nefarious activities from the investigators. Featureing a brand new piece of FULL ART from Vincent Dutrait.

boardgame.name: The Forge of Rogbrok
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Forge of Rogbrok is a small introductory adventure for 1st-level characters, created entirely using the D&D Basic Rules. It should give a group of four 1st level characters enough experience points to advance to second level.

At a local tavern, the adventurers run into an old, drunken dwarven miner named Skirvir, who is boasting about having located an old dwarven mine, he is sure belonged to the long lost Jarnhammer clan. In fact, he is sure he has found the location of the lost halls of Gwandatholir itself...

boardgame.name: One Thousand Pre-Generated Basic Characters
boardgame.description:
User summary:

One Thousand Pre-Generated Basic Characters presents concise characters following a standardized format.

The document includes tables to select random characters by race.

boardgame.name: Cyberpunk RED (Core Rulebook)
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to the Time of the Red, Choomba! The Megacorporations spent decades wrecking everything and in the aftermath of their last War, everyone has to fend for themselves.

But that’s just fine. You can handle it. After all, in a world of vicious boostergangs, rampaging cyborgs, corporate assassins, and nihilistic doomsday cults, there’s only one rule: Always take it to the Edge.

Take the big risks, get the big rewards. Be the action, start the rebellion, light the fire. Never drive slow when you can blaze a trail.

You’ve hooked your Militech pistol to the interface in your brain; upgraded your cybernetic fist with carbo-glas blades; and installed cybereyes that can pierce through the red haze like morning fog. There’s a world full of opportunities out there, just waiting for the right Edgerunner. Maybe that’s you.

Cyberpunk RED is the latest edition of the classic tabletop roleplaying game of the Dark Future and encompasses everything you need to explore the post-War world of the Time of the Red, including:

A dense, deep-dive into the history and geography of Night City and the greater Cyberpunk world, and plenty of the lore about the Time of the Red.
Ten unique Roles for you to play: charismatic Rockerboys, lethal Solos, quick-hacking Netrunners, inventive Techs, lifesaving (and taking) Medtechs, hard-hitting Medias, duty-bound Lawmen, scheming Execs, clever Fixers, and range-riding Nomads.
A huge collection of useful tools, powerful weapons, protective armor, and gleaming cyberware to help you rule the Street.
Three Screamsheet adventures to show you what Cyberpunk is all about.
Pregenerated opponents perfect for populating the Combat Zones and Corporate compounds, plus encounters that use them to bring the City to life.

boardgame.name: Torii
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





User Summary

An artistic game by Joaquín A. Castro with music by Adriano Martino about guild, frustration, life and death!

boardgame.name: A Knight's Quest
boardgame.description:
A gorgeous action adventure on an epic scale. Play as Rusty – a kind-hearted, but clumsy adventurer who accidentally starts a chain of events which will destroy his world. Solve mind-bending puzzles, fight challenging enemies, defeat huge bosses and platform your way through a fantastic open world in this lavish take on classic action adventure games.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: POPixel
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Jump from balloon to balloon popping them as you progress.

boardgame.name: Escape Of The Dead 2
boardgame.description:
Escape of the Dead 2 is a game for 1 player where the player plays as a survivor heading to the Hospital seeking for help in a zombie-infested city. Roll dice and strategically decide your fate: Will you drive as fast as possible? Or will you defend your health endlessly? Whatever you do, you always need to Survive!

Overview:
Reach the hospital without depleting fuel or health along the way. The player will be encountering large groups of zombies, craft tools to help mitigate those dice luck, and stumbles into both fortunate and unfortunate events, well mostly the latter. Based on actions played throughout the game, the player will score only if the player reaches the hospital.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Sky Mercenaries
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Bullet hell shooter with multiple ships, skill trees and co-op mode.

boardgame.name: A Touch of Evil: Dark Gothic – Dark Keep Supplement
boardgame.description:
Exploring the dark and foreboding Keep that has been abandoned for countless years, you push through the Sinking Marshlands to descend into the catacombs and crypts in search of The Lost Tomb... and the vital clues it may hold! But, there are many dangers to face in the deep places of the world, and the Flickering Light of your Crypt Lantern threatens to leave you in the dark.

This 15 card Game Supplement for the Dark Gothic Deck Building Game is themed for the Abandoned Keep outside of Shadowbrook and adds new Gear, Allies, Minions, and more, some utilizing the new Roaming mechanic first introduced in the Colonial Horror Expansion. Explore the Dark Keep, but beware the ghosts and vampires that roam its shadowed halls.

-description from the publisher's website
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: A Touch of Evil: Dark Gothic
A Touch of Evil: Dark Gothic – Colonial Horror

listing.notes: Brand new

boardgame.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Frontier Town Daily Event Pack #1 Supplement
boardgame.description:
Every day on the Frontier is an adventure. Especially in the region around the ruins of Brimstone. As Rolling Tumbleweed blows across the trails and the Crisp Morning Air settles into the streets, you never know what new excitement the day will bring. Will a Derailed Train tear through the town, a Fire spread through the Camp, or is Luck in the Air? There may even be a Killer on the Loose. Yes, life is always exciting in the shadows of Brimstone. Short...but exciting.

This 15 card Game Supplement for the Shadows of Brimstone Frontier Town Expansion includes a brand new set of Frontier Town Daily Event cards to liven up your Town Stays. These cards can be added to the Frontier Daily Event deck to nearly double the number of cards, adding fantastic variety to your Town Stays between every Adventure.

-description from publisher's website
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients
Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients (Revised Edition)
Shadows of Brimstone: Frontier Town Expansion
Shadows of Brimstone: Swamps of Death
Shadows of Brimstone: Swamps of Death (Revised Edition)

boardgame.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Holy Expedition
boardgame.description:
Description from the publisher:

Many areas around the ruins of Brimstone are overrun with hordes of demonic and Undead creatures, growing in strength before unleashing upon the defenseless settlements across the countryside. To hold this gathering Darkness at bay, devout Heroes set out on Holy Expeditions to smite these blasphemous foes before they can spread their foul corruption throughout the land.

This 15-card Game Supplement for Shadows of Brimstone allows Hero Posses that include at least one Holy Hero to make any Adventure into a Holy Expedition! Including a new Adventure Card for Holy Expeditions, a set of new Encounters themed for these dangerous missions to smite Demonic and Undead foes, and a new Corrupted Enemy Trait card to make any Enemies you face off against possessed by demons, this set also introduces 8 all new Blessing and Judgement Sermons for use with the Preacher Hero Class.

CONTENTS

Card #512 Holy Vision (Preacher Sermon (Blessing))
Card #513 Consecrate (Preacher Sermon (Blessing))
Card #514 Fortitude (Preacher Sermon (Blessing))
Card #515 Guide (Preacher Sermon (Blessing))
Card #516 Ruin (Preacher Sermon (Judgement))
Card #517 Wrath (Preacher Sermon (Judgement))
Card #518 Voice of Command (Preacher Sermon (Judgement))
Card #519 Exorcism (Preacher Sermon (Judgement))
Card #520 Holy Expedition (Adventure)
Card #521 Corrupted (Enemy Trait)
Card #522 Gruesome Display (Mine Encounter)
Card #523 Servants of Darkness (Mine Encounter)
Card #524 Blasphemous Markings (Mine Encounter)
Card #525 Confronting Evil (Mine Encounter)
Card #526 Guiding Light (Mine Encounter)
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients
Shadows of Brimstone: Swamps of Death

boardgame.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Old West Personal Items Pack #1
boardgame.description:
Description from the publisher:

Heroes don't just appear out of thin air; they've lived, they've loved, and they've lost to get where they are. To be ready to stand toe-to-toe with the Darkness and stare out into the open Void without instantly losing their mind to the madness. Whether it's a personal Letter from the President, a Faded Photograph, an Old War Wound, or your Father's Pistol, every Hero has a story that's lead them to this road.

This 15-card Game Supplement for Shadows of Brimstone adds a set of all new Personal Item cards themed for Heroes in the Old West. These greatly add to the variety of character pieces and backstory seeds for starting new Heroes, as well as new and exciting bonuses granted by these iconic and powerful items.

CONTENTS

Card#552 Blood Stained Book
Card#553 Letter from the President
Card#554 Silver Harmonica
Card#555 Faded Photograph
Card#556 Heritage Locket
Card#557 Old Wanted Poster
Card#558 Weathered Newspaper
Card#559 Father's Pistol
Card#560 Broken Arrowhead
Card#561 Membership Ring
Card#562 Legacy Bullets
Card#563 Black Feather
Card#564 Gold Medal
Card#565 Old War Wound
Card#566 Travel Hat
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Shadows of Brimstone: City of the Ancients
Shadows of Brimstone: Swamps of Death

boardgame.name: Plamo vs Plamo
boardgame.description:
Plamo vs Plamo (abbreviated to PvP) is a tabletop combat game where players design their own mecha combatants and bring their creations to the table to fight. From building to battling, players are given freedom to design and play with units that reflect their personality. Create a model that expresses your style, customize it to fit your needs in-game, and challenge your friends to a game!

PvP's game system is designed to keep players engaged at all times. Whether you're playing one-on-one against an opponent in a duel, playing a scenario requiring careful coordination of your team to complete an objective, or a chaotic six-player battle royale, downtime is short, action is fast, and players are kept making meaningful choices at all times.

A core aspect of PvP is unit customization, and the Unit Design Module allows players to create a huge range of machines both to reflect in-game mechanical diversity and their modelling efforts. The Unit Design Module allows players the freedom to combine Frames, Equipment and Weapons in any way they see fit while working within agreed-upon points limits.

If you want a tactical game of customizable mecha combat, Plamo vs Plamo is what you're looking for!

boardgame.name: Spin-A-Word: A Fun Word Game
boardgame.description:
A small clear plastic cylinder contains six tiny letter cubes. Players spin the cylinder and attempt to form words with the letters that appear. Points are awarded based on the length of the word. First person with the highest score over 200 points is declared the winner.

The game is entirely self-contained with the cylinder permanently mounted inside the box to create a cardboard tray. A smooth green space for writing words and keeping score with chalk is also inside the box.

boardgame.name: Watson's Watch
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




The game is still in active development, but a version of it has been made available to the public for purchase - Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).




User Summary

A detective game created in RPGMaker.

This game has been in early access since June 2016 and appears to be just the introduction.

boardgame.name: AdvertCity
AdvertCity - Collector's Edition
boardgame.description:
AdvertCity is a cyberpunk advertising tycoon game. Explore a massive procedural city, and plaster your adverts all over it. Float around a retro vision of cyberspace and post links online. Watch the economy of the city evolve with the effects of your decisions.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Safety Driving Simulator: Car
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A car driving simulator with a selection of cars and scenarios to choose from.

boardgame.name: Candy Blast
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A food-themed chain reaction puzzle game.

boardgame.name: モン研！！(Monken)
boardgame.description:
In モン研！！(Monken), the players are working at a research institute in a forest filled with monsters. They explore the forest, respond to requests from the Monster Exploration Association, and breed new types of monsters.

The game is a worker placement game where you must feed your workers, but rather than knowing what action spaces your workers will occupy, to simulate the forest exploration aspect, each location begins the game face down and will return face down after each round, so there is a memory element.

boardgame.name: Minarett: La caída de Darkófenes
boardgame.description:
Minarett, The Fall of Darkófenes, is a board game for 2 to 4 players. Each player will represent one of the great guilds of the city where they must use their heroes to gain influence or sabotage their rivals in the race to ascend to the throne of Minarett.

The players control 3 heroes in order to obtain the necessary influence to win. Every turns the heroes can move through the city and perform dangerous missions or face fearsome threats. The heroes can even assassinate other rivals and equip themselves with legendary items.

At the end of the game, the player who has the most influence will wear the crown of Minarett.
-description from designer

boardgame.name: uZito
boardgame.description:
uZito is a balancing game, using pieces of different weights. The game advertises that it only has one basic rule: take a piece and put it on the top. Additionally, the publisher notes that the rulebook has almost no language in it, and the game can be easily understood through visuals alone.

The games' pieces appear to be floors, metal pillars, abstract muscular humans, large stones, and stacks of medium stones.

boardgame.name: LINKAGE
boardgame.description: LINKAGE is a game about tactile sensation where players balance sticks between their hands. Each player is given a color, and cards showing their color and fingers are shuffled with the cards of other players' fingers. When two cards are revealed, those players must balance a stick between those two fingers by pushing against it.

boardgame.name: WORMS
boardgame.description:
In WORMS, each player controls one worm, and the winner will be the person whose worm remains on the board the longest.

Each turn a player choose to roll the blue die or the red die. If they roll the blue die, they move their worm that many spaces, by pressing their finger on its head, and pulling it around the board. Then, they must add a piece to its tail, but can stop once the worm is 10 sections long.

If your worms runs into another worm, or itself, you have lost. Your worm will turn into a ghost and will have limited actions you can do on your turn.

If a player rolls the red die, the worm will not move or grow, but there is a chance it will simply be removed.

The last worm alive wins.

boardgame.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island – Painted Resin Markers
Robinson Crusoe: Przygoda na przeklętej wyspie – Żywiczne żetony
boardgame.description:
Hand-painted Resin Markers. Set contains:

18 wood markers
7 fur markers
12 banana markers
5 nonperishable food markers
5 wound markers
1 camp marker
1 shelter marker


—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island – Collector's Edition (Gamefound Edition)

boardgame.name: I.Q. 2000 Plus
boardgame.description:
This expansion offered 2000 new questions for the I.Q. 2000 base game. Can be played with or without an IQ2000 base game.

2 skill levels / 7 categories / plus 6 additional passports

boardgame.name: 1st Battle of El Alamein
boardgame.description:
1st El Alamein is a simplified simulation of the mid 1942 battle in the desert of Egypt that marks the high tide of the Afrika Korps in the desert.

Although the later battles of Alam Halfa and especially 2nd El Alemein are more famous, it was the Commonwealth’s survival in this July battle that stopped the Afrika Korps and saved Egypt.

Advanced and optional rules based on historical events are included for more experienced players looking for a deeper and more complicated game.

Sequence of play:
Step 1 -Allocate support units
Step 2 –Move any or all Axis units
Step 3 –Axis declare Combats
Step 4– Allies side Movement
Step 5– Allied side declare Combat
Step 6– Move Axis armour units
Step 7- Move Allied armour units
Step 8– Axis armour declare combats
Step 9– Reinforcements
Step 10- Administration
Step 11– Victory Determination

boardgame.name: Ostalgie: Fall of the Curtain
boardgame.description:
The Iron Curtain has fallen. The era of change has come to Eastern Europe, but does everyone need these changes? The Cold War is coming to an end, and "cradles of the revolution" join the fight for their existence in the system of new world order. But will they be able to stay afloat, while preserving all the achievements and ideals of the revolution?

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: The Franz Kafka Videogame
boardgame.description:
The Franz Kafka Videogame is an indie adventure game inspired by the writings of Franz Kafka.
The protagonist named K. gets a sudden offer of employment. And this event changes his life, forcing him to make a distant voyage. To his surprise, the world beyond his homeland appears to be not as normal as he would think.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Franz_Kafka_Videogame The Franz Kafka Videogame]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.
